item.title: INFINITY BULLETS now available
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Multi-directional shoot 'em up game launches worldwide.

Following a soft launch in North America on July 1, multi-directional shoot ’em up game INFINITY BULLETS is now available for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play worldwide, developer HEXADRIVE announced. It is free-to-play with in-app purchases.

Here are the latest details:

■ New Playable Character: Ling-Feng Joins the Battle!

Ling-Feng, a Taoist warrior who inherited the sacred spear Azure Lion on Mount Kunlun, is now available as a new playable character.
Specialized in close-range combat and critical strikes, Ling-Feng can be unlocked by collecting “Genome information: Ling-Feng.”

■ Limited-Time Pickup Event!

A special Ling-Feng Pickup event will be held from September 1 to 25, 23:59 (UTC).

During this event, equipment supply boxes containing “Genome information: Ling-Feng” will be available.

Note: This pickup may return in the future after the event period ends.

■ Pre-Registration Rewards Distributed to All Players!

To celebrate surpassing 10,000 pre-registrations, we are distributing special rewards to all users. Players can now claim a massive amount of Gems along with items essential for early-game progression.

Reward Contents:

  • 10,000 Gems
  • 300,000 Coins
  • 30 Hunter Tickets
  • 1,000 Wonder Essences
  • 180 Equipment Upgrade Blueprints (30 of each type)

Log in now and claim these luxurious launch rewards to kick-start your adventure!

■ New Stage “Mars” Unlocked!

With the global release, a brand-new stage—Mars—has been added.

Available from Main Stage 5-1 onward, players can explore a mysterious new planet and experience thrilling new challenges.

■ September Update Roadmap

A beta version of the Ranking Boss Battle will launch in mid-September!

Your damage against bosses will be directly converted into score, with rankings updated each season.

September will serve as a beta test period, while the full release is planned for October, along with further expansions.

■ About INFINITY BULLETS

INFINITY BULLETS brings together veteran pixel artists from the 80s and 90s, merging the survivor-style genre with classic shooting gameplay.

Players take on the role of “Acceptors,” harnessing their unique abilities to fight across various battlefields. By strengthening characters and equipment, players can enhance their forces to resist the alien invaders known as the Futurians and defend the world.
